text:
running apache2.2.14 64 bit worker and apr > 1.3.3 we get the following result when requesting a binary object like an image.

Connection: close  Transfer-Encoding: chunked    %lx  

this is issue does not exist in 32bit or apr 1.3.3 64bit. We tried several apr releases and are currently running on 1.3.12.


I can provide test setups and rebuild apr if needed. 

We currently build arp and apache with gcc 4.3.4 -O2 -kPIC
creator: remko@initworks.com

text:
(In reply to comment #1)
> mixup with 32bit and 43bit header files

mixup with 32bit and 64bit header files
